column1: Node* findMiddle(Node* head) { Node *slow = head, *fast = head; while (fast != nullptr && fast->next != nullptr) { slow = slow->next; fast = fast->next->next; } return slow; }

column1: Node* findNthNodeFromEnd(Node* head, int n) { Node *fast = head, *slow = head; for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) { if (fast == nullptr) return nullptr; fast = fast->next; } while (fast != nullptr) { slow = slow->next; fast = fast->next; } return slow; }
